lead_paragraph: The World Anti-Doping Agency (WADA) on Monday defended the publication date of a damning report on doping in Russia, a day after the International Olympic Committee blamed it for the uncertainty surrounding Russian athletes at the Rio de Janeiro Games.

headline.print_headline: WADA Defends Timing of Russia Report After IOC Criticism
headline.main: WADA Defends Timing of Russia Report After IOC Criticism
